actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to facilitate and expedite the provision of hydroelectric power at water resources development projects to be constructed by the Department of the Army Corps of Engineers.

summary.text: Hydroelectric Power Development Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to construct water resources development projects for hydroelectric power, utilizing funds from the Hydroelectric Power Development Fund created by this Act. Stipulates that non-Federal authorities must agree to share project costs as a prerequisite to construction. Stipulates that the United States shall assume the obligation for all additional costs not caused by non-Federal authorities. Authorizes the appropriation of $25,000,000 for deposit in the Hydroelectric Power Development Fund, and any such additional sums as necessary to maintain the fund at an average minimum balance of $25,000,000.

titles.title: A bill to facilitate and expedite the provision of hydroelectric power at water resources development projects to be constructed by the Department of the Army Corps of Engineers.
